attributes.action: Introduce by 2010 legislation requiring the manufacturers of all household electrical goods to include switches to enable the items to be switched off fully rather than being left on standby.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Such a measure would have the beneficial effect of reducing demands for electricity by allowing electrical items to be turned off, rather than continuously drawing power.   Many items now can ONLY be left on standby representing an environmental problem.  This measure would also be more successful if the number of electrical items containing clocks were also reduced.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
